remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  Utility lemma. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2012.)  (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)
statement:
cdleme20z.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.

cdleme20y $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( R e. A /\ S e. A /\ T e. A ) /\ ( S =/= T /\ -. R .<_ ( S .\/ T ) ) ) -> ( ( S .\/ R ) ./\ ( T .\/ R ) ) = R ) $.
